original_text: 今年第七篇论文，和南加大Georgila博士合著的"AUTOMATIC DETECTION OF UNNATURAL WORD-LEVEL SEGMENTS IN UNIT-SELECTION SPEECH SYNTHESIS"，被ASRU 2011录取。今年ASRU的录取率比ICASSP低6%，比INTERSPEECH低了16%。
